hero.title: Turn Your Special Day Into Perfection
hero.subtitle: Ensure every detail of your fairytale wedding is perfect.

intro.title: Ensure every detail of your fairytale wedding is perfect.
intro.paragraph1: Elite Wedding Planner specializes in designing, planning, and organizing complete wedding packages. We are the trusted choice for busy couples who want a professional team to manage the entire process on their behalf.
intro.paragraph2: With a commitment to respecting client opinions, optimizing budgets, and ensuring quality service, Elite accompanies you to create a perfect, complete wedding that bears your personal signature.

team.title: Meet the Ellie Team
team.subtitle: Premier wedding planning service
team.description1: We provide premium wedding planning services.
team.description2: Ellie specializes in creating beautiful, memorable weddings that reflect your unique style and personality. Let us turn your wedding dream into reality.

testimonials.title: Love Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from couples who trusted us

items.content: "Working with Ellie Wedding Planner was the best decision we made. They transformed our vision into reality and handled every detail flawlessly."
"Thank you team for supporting the bride and groom so enthusiastically. We were very lucky to meet you. The party went smoothly and everything was taken care of very well."

"We just did it quickly on the plane now actually - we sent a bit more than what you asked - the rest is for you girls as a little extra to say thank you so much for the support. We had an amazing wedding thank to you girls ðŸ¥°ðŸ¥° we hope you continue to support more couples on their special day!!"

full.name: Full Wedding Package
full.description: For couples who want end-to-end support.

beforeWedding.title: Before Wedding Day
items: Consultation, detailed planning on decoration style, program suitable for budget.
Survey venues together with the couple.
Design, print invitations and necessary decoration details.

onWeddingDay.title: On Wedding Day
items: Welcome guests, guide according to family requirements.
Work with filming, photography team and handle logistics.

afterWedding.title: After Wedding Day
items: Work with filming, photography team for final edits.
Acceptance and payment of remaining amounts with vendors.

coordination.name: Coordination Package
coordination.description: Suitable for couples who have planned in detail.

scope.title: Scope of Work
items: Receive and review the couple's entire plan.
Create detailed timeline for wedding day.
Coordinate vendors (decoration, sound, lighting, filming, photography...).
Control program progress, handle arising incidents.
Focus on 1-2 months before wedding day.

forCouples.title: For Couples Who
items: Have chosen venue, booked services, designed script.
Want to fully enjoy wedding day without worrying about timeline.
Have family/friends support but still want expert assurance.

closing.title: Create Your Dream Wedding with Our Team
closing.subtitle: Accompanying couples on their special day

contact.subtitle: Ready to start planning? Contact us for a free consultation. We'd love to hear your ideas and help you turn them into reality.
